title: Welcome to Maffra
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Dinners and dining
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Veterans, disabled
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Gippsland (Vic.) - Description and travel
abstract: A welcome to the town of Maffra. Interviews with locals and visits to places of interest.
description: This film starts with Darren McCubbin, the Mayor of the Wellington Shire, welcoming the audience to Maffra. Darren explains that we are about to visit some of the places and meet some of the people that make Maffra a unique place to live. The film features the Geoff Webster Centre, the Gippsland Vehicle Collection, the Maffra Gymnastics Club, the George Gray Centre, Wallaby Rise Restaurant, Cambrai Backpacker Hostel and Jenny McDavitt an Alpaca farmer and Ferial Zikerman who is now internationally known for her Maffra Cheese.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2001710; ACMI in the regions: Stories from Maffra; Active; 2009
